title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2141/89 of 14 July 1989 concerning the classification of certain goods under CN codes 3921 11 00 and 4810 12 00
header:
18.7.1989 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 205/22
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2141/89
of 14 July 1989
concerning the classification of certain goods under CN codes 3921 11 00 and 4810 12 00
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The goods described below are classified under the CN codes indicated against each of them:
Lightweight panels of rectangular or square shape made up of a plate of expanded polystyrene covered on both sides by a sheet of paper. The total thickness of the paper is less than 10 % of the total thickness of the article 3921 11 00
Lightweight panels of rectangualar or square shape made up of a layer of expanded polystyrene covered on both sides by a sheet of white kaolin-coated paper not containing fibres obtained by a mechanical process and weighing more than 150 g/m2. The total thickness of the paper is at least 10 % of the total thickness of the article 4810 12 00
Items 1 and 2 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3564/88 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature are deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 169, 19. 6. 1989, p. 1.
(3)  OJ No L 311, 17. 11. 1988, p. 23.
